questions.question: What are your daily habits? What time do you get up, etc.?

answers.answer: I get up at 7am and I take a shower! This very important if I want to feel me awake. Every morning I look at my Facebook and I wish "happy birthday" to my friends.
Then I take a breakfast. Food it's my life!! I never forget to brush my teeths.
I take the bus to University going.
